cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Draw 3 cards and destroy this card.
[PASSIVE] While you control 4 Quarter Pillar of the Sky’s: you win the game.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle 5 Air Equipment from your grave into your deck then draw a card.
[ACTIVATED] If you have 3 copies of ‘Wings of the Next Angel’ in your grave: deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion.
